name: Bubble Boogie [Demo]
description:
Bubble Boogie

Check out the full game here!

Bubble Boogie is a fresh dance rhythm game, you follow routines and score points by popping, punching and chopping bubbles in time with the music!

This first release features 15 unique songs to get your body moving. Once you have mastered all the moves in Casual Mode, you can then move on to Pro mode and REALLY test your skills (Awesome dancers only).

If you look really hard, you may be able to spot the secret dance instructor, who will show you all the moves!

Just follow the Boogie moves...and your Bubble score will improve!

♪┏(・o･)┛♪┗ ( ･o･) ┓♪

The Demo

To give you a taste of Bubble Boogie, we decided to create a free demo! The demo includes:

  • Scoring system
  • One virtual club – 'The Boogie Dome'
  • Dance move instructor
  • Crowd to cheer you on
  • Casual & Pro mode
  • Local leaderboard
  • 1 Hit 70's song 'Boogie Oogie Oogie'
The Full Game

Our full game features:

  • Scoring system
  • One virtual club – 'The Boogie Dome'
  • Dance move instructor
  • Crowd to cheer you on
  • Casual & Pro mode
  • Local leaderboard
  • 15 Unique Songs
Coming Soon:

We are consistently working to make Bubble Boogie the best we possibly can, here are some things you can expect to be added to the game in the future:

  • Hits from global pop stars
  • Improved gameplay
  • Global leaderboard
  • Multiplayer "Dance Offs"
  • More downloadable songs
  • Themed clubs
  • Music from every decade
We want to hear from you!

We want to make Bubble Boogie even better, so we take feedback seriously!

We would love to hear what you have to say about our game and we aim to work with the community to make it as awesome as possible!

If you have something to say, you can get in touch with us via email at info@vstars.co.uk, or interact with us on our socials!
